name: Grey Mode
author: Hiro

sections.description:
Added new feature and fixed some problem when enable debug mode

Special thanks to https://github.com/kanmanus/mourn.js for the awesome jQuery library
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/hiro-greymode directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

  3. Use the Grey Mode Name screen to configure the plugin

  4. That’s it!
sections.faq:
How it’s work?

This plugin can change color in whole page to grey color, and also have toggle box to change to normal color
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Added ribbon functionality

  • Improved performance

  • changed some text in the backend

  • fixed some error on debug mode

  • Code refactoring

1.0.0

  • Start with basic functionality

short_description: Plugin that change your website to grey scale, If user would like to change to normal color? easy! we provide toggle button to switch it!
